raw: Eliana Maria  Personal Information  Gender Female Age 38 Nationality Spanish Location Vienna, Austria  Education  Bachelor's degree in Computer Engineering Polytechnic University of Madrid, Spain  Experience  Senior Information Security Analyst Gaia Cybersecurity Solutions  Managed the implementation and maintenance of ISO 27001 management system for  multinational clients.  Conducted internal audits and provided guidance on data protection regulations.  Developed and delivered training sessions on information security awareness. June 2018 – Present (6 years) Vienna, Austria  IT Risk Consultant ABC Risk Management Services  Conducted risk assessments and gap analyses for clients in various industries.  Advised on regulatory compliance including GDPR and national data protection laws.  Developed and implemented risk mitigation strategies. January 2012 – January 2018 (6 years) Madrid, Spain  Skills   Proficient in ISO 27001 management system  Extensive knowledge of GDPR and data protection regulations  Strong project management and communication skills  Fluent in English, Spanish, and Catalan
